reference_summary:
COSYMAY 20 inch Human Hair Wig for Women Long Black Wig with Bangs 4x4 Lace Closure Straight Wig Brazilian Virgin Hair Full Wig Average Size 1B COSYMAY {'Hair Type': 'Straight', 'Brand': 'COSYMAY', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Package Dimensions': '9.96 x 6.73 x 2.72 inches; 11.99 Ounces', 'UPC': '738627428647'} [[VIDEOID:9118ad20b0e9a447f9b3a276479f331c]] Wow! This hair is gorgeous! Very nice thickness for a 20 inch and silky to the touch with so much body. The closure is perfect on this wig as well! Just to give you guys an idea of the body of this hair I uploaded videos but excuse me for still having my edges wrapped up lol Silky and Quality Hair! Senegalese Twist Crochet Hair Extensions Ombre-Brown - 32inch 8Packs Synthetic Crochet Braids Pre Looped Crochet Hair Synthetic Braiding Hair (32 inch, T30) ToyoTree {'Package Dimensions': '16.5 x 7.2 x 2.1 inches; 1.6 Pounds', 'UPC': '781827816141'} [[VIDEOID:a3e393606a2e6dcef86b83ecc97fa694]] These are a very nice quality synthetic hair but they are small so I’d you’re going for a more fuller look I suggest getting more but if you’re going to space your crochets quite a bit or do individuals with these you should be okay. Very long too, but it’s great they give you a free gift of the crochet needle and jewels so no need for a store trip! Nice Quality Twist But May Need More Packs! lorelo 20 pieces Hair Curlers, Hair Rollers Spiral Curls Styling Kit No Heat Hair Curlers with Styling Hooks for Girls Woman lorelo {'Number of Items': '20', 'Material': 'Silicone', 'Brand': 'Lorelo', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '10.59 x 9.02 x 2.8 inches; 9.59 Ounces', 'UPC': '619156721396'} Perfect for curling hair the heartless way! The application stick is very long so it can be very useful to long hair types and the application can be adjusted to shorted types by removing a layer. Easy application as well! For application:
-slide hook side first through the roller while it is stretched out
-make sure when you slide it through the hook is showing as well as the bottom of the tool so you can pull it easy off your hair
-hook a small section of your hair (start at the root)
- once your hair is hooked hold the top of the curler gently and the bottom of the tool and gently pull your hair through until the entire hook is out and your hair is covered by the curler.
-and your done! (For best results leave it on overnight if you can!)
Hope this helps anyone! ❤️ Perfect Heatless Curling tool! Nail Powder Vcedas 12 Colors Acrylic Powder Set for Nail UV Gel Powder Dust Design Decoration 3D Manicure Vcedas {'Product Dimensions': '5.91 x 3.94 x 0.79 inches; 6.38 Ounces'} Nice vibrant colors! Very inclusive powder set with so many colors to choose from! Can’t wait to try this on my nails!! You must buy the acrylic liquid and brush applicator separate! Colors are perfect! Nail Files 16 Pcs, Double Sided Emery Board Manicure Tools for Filing Natural Gel and Acrylic Nails for Home and Salon Use Keiby Citom {'Material': 'Acrylic', 'Brand': 'Keiby Citom', 'Grit Number': '100', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '7.8 x 5.08 x 0.59 inches; 5.29 Ounces', 'UPC': '742025065137', 'Manufacturer': 'YHIT'} I used these to file at my acrylic nails in the application process and these did me wonders! Also I used this file it off when I’m removing my acrylic and it works perfect! Perfect For Natural and Acrylic Nails! Face and Body Paint Kit By Color Technik 24 Professional Oil Based Flash Colors, 2 Sets of 12 Color Palettes, 6 Paint Brushes 70 Stencils 2 Sponges Non-Toxic For Adults & Kids Halloween Painting Party Color Technik {'Brand': 'Color Technik', 'Package Information': 'Palette', 'Package Type': 'Palette', 'Skin Type': 'Sensitive', 'Package Dimensions': '9 x 5 x 1 inches; 8.78 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'CTFPS24'} Nice pigment in the colors. Nice and bright. Got this for Halloween so it’s going to do justice with my costume and my kids costume! Cant Wait Until Halloween.
profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Product Type Preference:** The user has expanded their interest to include face and body paint products, alongside a continued strong focus on wigs (especially long, straight styles with bangs), crochet hair extensions, and nail care items, particularly acrylic powders and manicure tools.
- **Quality Expectations:** The user maintains high standards for all beauty products, emphasizing vibrancy, variety, and quality, and continues to appreciate functional tools that enhance usability during application processes, regardless of the product category.
- **Brand Familiarity:** The user has had positive experiences with established brands in the beauty industry while remaining open to exploring new offerings, particularly in the realm of artistic and practical beauty supplies.
- **Visual Engagement:** Actively engages with the beauty community through multimedia content, sharing reviews and personal experiences, which showcases their commitment to product appreciation across both hair care and creative beauty applications.
- **Attention to Detail:** The user evidences a keen focus on product features that enhance practicality and performance, including usability in artistic applications like body painting and traditional hair and nail care.
- **User Engagement Style:** Enthusiastic and expressive in feedback, the user provides detailed insights and tips on product usage and effectiveness, enhancing the experience for others in the beauty community.
- **Rating Trends:** Consistently awards positive ratings to products that meet or exceed expectations, reflecting a strong appreciation for quality, functionality, and aesthetic appeal in beauty products across various categories.

Overall, the user exemplifies a broad interest in high-quality beauty options and actively participates in knowledge sharing within the community.
